title: C1131, C1132, C1133, C11345 Rear Preload Motor End Stop Detection Error

body.body: C1131, C1132, C1133, C11345 Rear Preload Motor End Stop Detection Error
Incorrect detection of minimum preload end-stop, within allowable tolerance for continued use - adjustment currently disabled
Rear preload motor calibration is started automatically after next ignition cycle
Allow rear preload motor to calibrate, see
Rear Suspension Unit Preload Motor Calibration
Incorrect detection of minimum preload end-stop, within allowable tolerance for continued use - awaiting valid calibration
Incorrect detection of minimum preload end-stop, outside of allowable tolerance for continued use - adjustment currently disabled
Incorrect detection of minimum preload end-stop, outside of allowable tolerance for continued use - awaiting valid calibration
Incorrect detection of maximum preload end-stop, within allowable tolerance for continued use - adjustment currently disabled
Incorrect detection of maximum preload end-stop, within allowable tolerance for continued use - awaiting valid calibration
Incorrect detection of maximum preload end-stop, outside of allowable tolerance for continued use - adjustment currently disabled
Incorrect detection of maximum preload end-stop, outside of allowable tolerance for continued use - awaiting valid calibration
